TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SetValueOverride(DependencyObject d, object value);
.class public auto ansi sealed SetValueOverride extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Object> to set the value to.
Docs.summary: Allows a custom override of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> logic associated with a dependency property that is defined on a dependency object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
The implementation of this delegate can be set to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.SetValueOverride%2A> property of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> while calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.
